 Common Questions 
 What is the difference between Harvard College and Harvard University? What is a "liberal arts & sciences" education? Paying the admissions application fee is a hardship for my family. Can I get a waiver? Can I self-report my test scores? Do I need a minimum required SAT, ACT or Subject Test score?

  Danoff Dean of Harvard College
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Learn more about our mission, vision, and history 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

  Our Path Forward
 
 

  Harvard College is committed to the academic progression of our students, which we must pursue while protecting the health and safety of our community.
